ch0279_00_kakeru/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I thought you’d show
up soon!
ch0279_00_kakeru/0101_0701_02_10: When you’re ready to head out, let’s go together!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7101_0701_01_10: Have you ever had your fortune told?
ch0279_00_kakeru/7101_0701_02_10:
I have, back when I was in Celadon City in Kanto.
It was pretty accurate!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7101_0701_03_10:
If there’s a specific Pokémon you’d like to meet,
try getting your fortune told!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7102_0701_01_10: I’m a Trainer from Pallet Town!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7102_0701_02_10:
A lot of really famous people started their journey
there, so I’ve got a lot to live up to!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7102_0701_03_10:
The pressure’s intense, but someday, I’m gonna be
one of those famous people!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7103_0701_01_10: Hey, do you see any Pokémon fur stuck to me?
ch0279_00_kakeru/7103_0701_02_10:
I was playing with Pokémon just now, so I was
worried some of its fur might’ve stuck to me...
ch0279_00_kakeru/7104_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I’d be walking around Kanto with a
Pokémon and it’d find an item for me!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7104_0701_02_10:
Catching lots of Pokémon takes a whole lot of
money and Poké Balls, so I was always happy
to get a freebie!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you consider yourself a good runner,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0279_00_kakeru/7105_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon and I often play by chasing each
other around, so I’m pretty confident in my
running skills!
ch0279_00_kakeru/7105_0701_03_10: Let’s race together with our Pokémon sometime!
ch0279_00_kakeru/1701_0701_01_10:
You’ll never guess what I found lying around!
Here, have a look!
ch0279_00_kakeru/1701_0702_01_10:
I’ve got a ton already, so I thought I’d share with
you!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2501_0701_01_10:
I feel like I’ve gotten way more skilled as a
Trainer since coming to Pasio!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve just gotta keep this up so I can get even
better than the Trainers who started before me!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m still just a beginner, so I may not be as good
at Pokémon battles as others are...
ch0279_00_kakeru/2501_0702_02_10:
but I won’t lose to anyone when it comes to my
love for Pokémon or my running speed!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2511_0701_01_10:
There are Pokémon and Trainers from a whole lot
of different regions here on Pasio.
ch0279_00_kakeru/2511_0701_02_10:
I always learn something new when I talk to them.
It’s really exciting!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2511_0701_03_10:
I wanna go on adventures in a lot of different
regions, too!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2511_0702_01_10:
I wonder what sorts of people and Pokémon I
could find in all the places I’ve never been...
ch0279_00_kakeru/2511_0702_02_10:
Just thinking about it makes me so excited I can’t
stand still! I wanna take off running this instant!
ch0279_00_kakeru/2511_0702_03_10:
I’ve gotta keep working hard to help make
Professor Oak’s dream come true too!
ch0279_00_kakeru/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re looking sleepy! Let’s go on a run with our
Pokémon to wake up!
ch0279_00_kakeru/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna play with my Pokémon after lunch! Why
don’t you join us?
ch0279_00_kakeru/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s dark, but I’m still full of energy! I wonder what
I’ll do tomorrow!
